articles.title: Realme 6i Said to Launch in India Soon as a Rebranded Realme 6s - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme 6i was launched in March, and was brought to India as the Realme Narzo 10. Now, a report claims the Realme 6i model that will be launched in India is in fact a rebranded Realme 6s.
